name: on beauty | a collection | a calendar for 2014
description: * * * PRE-ORDER ONLY. The calendar will begin shipping on November 4. You will receive an email when your order has shipped.* * * * * * "Most importantly to me, my own capacity for seeing beauty and complexity was developing." * * * Part record of my travels over the past ten years, part essay reflecting on my understanding of beauty, and part collection of resonant objects, on beauty is a meditative way to count your days in 2014. Each calendar in the edition of thirty is hand-colored (printed in black in, tinted with watercolor by me) and numbered. Calendars ship in a clear poly envelope inside a bubble envelope, with a binder clip for hanging. Dimensions: A5 (148 x 210 mm). Made in Belgium. * * *

name: bunnies | CARD SET
description:
Please note that most of my work is now only available at http://miel.bigcartel.com :)

* * *

How does the rabbit get onto the moon in the first place? (Don't see a rabbit in the moon? Check here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moon_rabbit ). These card have the answer: four rabbits, each with their own way of flying.

You'll get one of each design. The cards are A6, on 200gsm watercolor paper, printed with fade-resistant ink. They come with white envelopes and are blank inside.

Quantity: 4 cards, 4 envelopes
Specs: A6 white watercolor paper (200gsm), white envelopes
Inside: Blank


The shop will open November 2 around 2 p.m. UK time (8 a.m. US Central time)

name: robins & rosehips | CARD SET
description:
Please note that most of my work is now only available at http://miel.bigcartel.com :)

* * *

Late autumn and winter in England have always been marked, for me, by the appearance of two red things: rose hips and European robins (little and round, with a very sweet song--quite different from the American robins that mark spring in Minneapolis).

So: a set of six cards with robins & rosehips. You'll get one of each design. The cards are A6, on 200gsm watercolor paper, printed with fade-resistant ink. They come with white envelopes and are blank inside--perfect for sending all through winter.

Quantity: 6 cards, 6 envelopes
Specs: A6 white watercolor paper (200gsm), white envelopes
Inside: Blank


The shop will open November 2 around 2 p.m. UK time (8 a.m. US Central time)
